com.ktm_technologies.nlcmd

Class Nlcmd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ktm_technologies.nlcmd.Nlcmd

  • public class Nlcmd
extends Object
    This class provides static global command matching and execution callback with the #action() method as well as related settings. For internal use there are auxiliary functions such as logging. TODO Actually use java logger instead of System.out

      • getOrder

        public static int getOrder()
        Returns:
        Order for markov chains, that is number of relevant previous steps when matching

      • setOrder

        public static void setOrder(int order)
                     throws IllegalStateException
        Parameters:
        order - Order for markov chains, that is number of relevant previous steps when matching
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If actions have already been registered, it's not possible to use this method any more.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Unregister all existing actions.

      • action

        public static void action(String[] phrases,
                          MatchLambda callback)
        Register action with match phrases and hook
        Parameters:
        phrases - Training phrases to build a markov chain for this action
        callback - Hook to run when the action is activated

      • action

        Parameters:
        phrases - Training phrases to build a markov chain for this action
        callback - Hook to run when the action is activated

      • match

        public static void match(String phrase)
        Match input phrase against actions and run the best fitting one. The #match() method only considers full lengths input phrase covering models.
        Parameters:
        phrase - Input phrase
        See Also:
        for sub-phrase matching

        See Also:
        for sub-phrase matching
